databases
Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
  databases.UserDatabase

public class UserDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

Handles the saving and loading of StudyPlans.

Author:
Niels Thykier, Frederik Nordahl Sabroe, Morten SÃ¸rensen

exists

public boolean exists(java.lang.String file)
Test if a .plan file exists. This is the same as exists(file, "plan");

Parameters:
file - the name of the file (without extension)
Returns:
true if the file exists

exists

public boolean exists(java.lang.String file,
                      java.lang.String extension)
Test if a file exists.

Parameters:
file - the name of the file without extension (without trailing . )
extension - the extension of the file (without leading .)
Returns:
true if the file exists.

saveStudyPlan

public void saveStudyPlan(StudyPlan plan)
                   throws CannotSaveStudyPlanException,
                          FilePermissionException
Saves a StudyPlan using the studentID as name using a ".plan" extension

Parameters:
plan - The StudyPlan you wish to save. (it will be stored as the "studentID.plan")
Throws:
CannotSaveStudyPlanException - if the plan could not be saved.
FilePermissionException - if the needed permissions were missing.

loadStudyPlan

public StudyPlan loadStudyPlan(java.lang.String studentID)
                        throws FilePermissionException,
                               java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               CorruptStudyPlanFileException
This is the same as calling loadStudyPlan(studentID, "plan");

Parameters:
studentID - load the StudyPlan for the Student ID.
Returns:
the StudyPlan
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if no filed has been saved for that student.
java.io.IOException - if Java classes failed.
CorruptStudyPlanFileException - if the StudyPlan file existed, but was not valid/readable.
FilePermissionException - If needed permissions were missing.

loadStudyPlan

public StudyPlan loadStudyPlan(java.lang.String file,
                               java.lang.String extension)
                        throws FilePermissionException,
                               java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                               CorruptStudyPlanFileException
Load a StudyPlan from a file.

Parameters:
file - the name of the file without extension and without trailing dot.
extension - the extension of the file without leading dot.
Returns:
The StudyPlan
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if no filed has been saved for that student.
CorruptStudyPlanFileException - If a file was saved for that student, but it contained garbage.
FilePermissionException - If needed permissions were missing.

deleteFile

public void deleteFile(java.lang.String file,
                       java.lang.String extension)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       FileCouldNotBeDeletedException,
                       FilePermissionException
Same as calling deleteFile(file, "plan");

Parameters:
file - name of file without extension and without trailing dot.
extension - the extension of the file without leading dot.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file did not exist.
FileCouldNotBeDeletedException - if the file could not be deleted.
FilePermissionException - If needed permissions were missing.

deleteFile

public void deleteFile(java.lang.String file)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       FileCouldNotBeDeletedException,
                       FilePermissionException
Same as calling deleteFile(file, "plan");

Parameters:
file - name of file without extension.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file did not exist.
FileCouldNotBeDeletedException - if the file could not be deleted.
FilePermissionException - If needed permissions were missing.
